entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Jasper
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 a.m. MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Snow level rising to 1500 metres this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries this evening. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
